page.title: 01Summary of the area
page.content: { This is predominantly a residential area with a good proportion of open space and recreational areas. {-------} Several major bus routes cross the area in a north-west to south-east direction and the main railway line from London to Liverpool crosses it in a largely north to south direction. A line carrying commuter traffic crosses the south-west corner of the area. {-------} There is no heavy industry. Service industries such as gas and electricity are represented, and a small amount of light manufacturing industry mostly consisting of fairly small individual units.
